about_the_game:
Step into Cloudshore Mansion, an ancient estate bound by a time spell of unknown origin. Formerly overseen by the eccentric High Theologian Alcofrebas Nazeer, the mansion holds opportunities for adventurers willing to brave its dangers, especially those with the advantage of immortality.

As you delve into Cloudshore’s magical wings, you’ll unlock new paths, reveal hidden locations, face treacherous adventurers like yourself, and confront powerful guardians bound to its timeless halls. Unravel the mansion's mysteries out of time and piece together the events that unfolded in the High Theologian's estate.

Discover spells, unique items, and ancient enchantments to forge your own class fantasy.

You are one of the few with the advantage of immortality. Collect and combine spells, items, and enchantments to create a unique class and gain the power to face the mansion’s denizens.

This game is meant to be the theory crafter’s dream. It has over 200 puzzle pieces that you can combine in unique ways to create the build you always wanted.

Unlock doors, secret rooms, and magical wings as you dive deeper into the mansion. Face Cloudshore mansion’s protectors and seek out the hidden lore of the High Theologian Alcofrebas to help the Archivist chronicle the events that transpired.

The Solace Diary - Entry 001

"Some years ago, an unexplained phenomenon took place in the city of Rho'Thanika, at the Cloudsview Mansion, estate of the esteemed High Theologian of the Rho Empire - Alcofrebas Nazeer.

The exact time of the incident is unknown, but in the early hours of the morning of Climb Remembrance Day, an attendant employed by the Nazeer estate reported being unable to establish contact with the mansion staff. The service door which was usually open for the early morning deliveries was still shut hours past the usual schedule.

In addition, the attendant reported the main gate being closed shut and a strange glow emanating from the keyhole, as well as from several of the visible windows around the mansion.

On the day of the incident, it was estimated that 113 people were inside Cloudsview Mansion.

Among them: 87 staff members—attendants, kitchen staff, gardeners, stable hands, theologians, and security personnel.

Alongside them were 23 visiting civilians, including representatives of the Explorer’s Guild, the Commerce Exchange Union, Deep Mountain Mining Co., petitioners seeking the counsel of Alcofrebas, and a handful of noble guests.

And then, of course, there was Alcofrebas Nazeer himself, alongside his daughter, Alice Nazeer.

But there was one person...one soul I didn’t expect to be there: my brother.

To this day, I still don’t know why.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 CPU @ 3.00GHz
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Uncover the mysteries of the mansion in this classless Action RPG. Permanently unlock abilities, gear and enchants to create your perfect class fantasy. Unlock doors to secret rooms, and magical wings as you dive deeper into the mansion and face its protectors to seek out what happened.
